ingredients.ingredient: 1 large Granny Smith apple, cored and thinly sliced

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easy spreading without tearing the bread
Slice apples thinly and assemble sandwiches close to serving time to prevent browning
The sweet cinnamon bread complements the mild, creamy Havarti cheese beautifully
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on creating balanced tea sandwiches where soft cheese, mild cheese, and tart apple work together harmoniously.
